devops.name: To-Do-Son
devops.desc: To-Do app written in Python that transcribes all your tasks in JSON format. It uses the JSON library for cleaner and overall better code; the terminal is customized using the art library. The project is provided with a Jenkins + Groovy pipeline to automate the building, testing, and Docker image-building phases of the project.
